spec.name: Zaouiya Tidjania - Ain chock
spec.description: Zaouiya Tidjania - Ain Chock is a local religious center associated with the influential **Tijaniyya Sufi order**, one of the largest Sufi brotherhoods in West Africa and Morocco. Located in the Ain Chock neighborhood, it serves as a community hub for members of the order, providing space for collective prayers, spiritual recitation, and teaching.

people.comment: The founder of the Tijaniyya Sufi order.

access.comment: Access is generally restricted to members of the Sufi order or with prior permission.
